title: Realistic Heart - Watch Face
summary: High-quality realistic watch face with animations and customization options.

descriptionHTML:
❤️ “You are an artist, and your heart is a masterpiece.” - Sleeping At Last

Realistic Heart Watch Face is a high-quality combination of realistic image and great animation. Not too detailed, yet provoking and stylish.

Choose between light and dark background, customize details, watch how your ambient mode adapts to changes. This is a watch face for those who like having something different.

🌟Main features:
- Different style options;
- Customizable elements;
- Optional animation;
- Smart ambient mode that copies the dial style;
- Battery indicator;
- Displays current day and date.

⌚Is it for me?
Realistic Heart is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 3;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG Watch Style;
✔ LG Watch Sport;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ Huawei Watch 2;
✔ Polar M600;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, S2 and S3 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Realistic Heart Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Not sure if ready to buy? Try out this watch face in our Collection app for free! - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.boost.watchcore 🙊
